CustomField.description: Percentage of Qualified Leads out of the Lead Guarantee
CustomField.formula:
IF(Lead_Guarantee__c = 0, 1, Qualified_Leads__c / Lead_Guarantee__c )
/* Formerly:
Qualified_Leads__c / Lead_Guarantee__c
Was resulting in #ERROR! in reports when Lead Guarantee was 0
-Jeff Fahndrich, 9/28/2023
*/
CustomField.label: % Completed
